analysis.summary: Vue single-file component that renders a static SVG graphic of the App Store label/icon.
analysis.purpose: Provide a reusable App Store badge/icon within the project’s icon library for use in UI components.

components.name: LabelAppStore
components.role: The root Vue component that outputs an <svg> element containing multiple <path> definitions to draw the App Store label.

dependencies: Relies on global CSS custom properties --black and --white for fill colors
analysis.usage:
Import the component where needed, e.g.

  import LabelAppStore from 'modules/icons/labels/LabelAppStore.vue'

and then use in a template as <LabelAppStore/> to display the icon.
notes: Fixed size viewBox (205×59) and hard-coded path data; not responsive unless wrapper CSS overrides svg width/height.
SVG fill colors are driven by CSS variables, allowing theme overrides.
Could be tree-shaken if not used, since it has no side effects.
